title: One Small Step For Cookie Baking
description: Imagine having your Thanksgiving meal in microgravity? That's the reality for the six astronauts aboard the International Space Station. Today, we look at the evolution of astronaut food and a planned attempt to bake chocolate chip cookies in space.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: One Small Step For Cookie Baking
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Inside NASA's food operation, and the Thanksgiving menu for astronauts aboard the International Space Station. Also, can you bake cookies in space?
itunes:subtitle: Inside NASA's food operation, and the Thanksgiving menu for astronauts aboard the International Space Station. Also, can you bake cookies in space?
content:encoded: Imagine having your Thanksgiving meal in microgravity? That's the reality for the six astronauts aboard the International Space Station. Today, we look at the evolution of astronaut food and a planned attempt to bake chocolate chip cookies in space.
